hero_description: AI localization for teams that ship fast. Break language barriers with real-time translation using the best LLM models. Support customers in 7 languages instantly.
feature1_desc: Support customers in English, Hindi, Bengali, Tamil, Spanish, Arabic, and Chinese
feature2_desc: Instant message translation powered by Google Translate - free, no API key needed
feature3_desc: Futuristic dark/light themes with smooth animations and gradients
feature4_desc: Just 3 lines of code to add multilingual support to your website
feature5_desc: Works perfectly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices
feature6_desc: JWT authentication and CORS protection for your data
